testproblem.name: stokes_test

variables.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_sat1 = stat("stokes_test.stat")["phase1"]["PhaseVolumeFraction"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_P = stat("stokes_test.stat")["phase1"]["Pressure"]["max"][-1]

testproblem.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_vel = stat("stokes_test.stat")["phase1"]["Velocity%magnitude"]["max"][-1]
